page.title: 16A local resident
page.content: Mrs Linda Amer has lived in Chinnor for 10 years. She was born in Sydenham a nearby village. She likes living in Chinnor because of the surrounding countryside and because there are plenty shops and restaurants. It is also near the M40 so it is easy to go almost anywhere. She shops for food in Thame at Tesco and in High Wycombe for clothes, especially at Richards. In her spare time she enjoys gardening, keep fit and jazz dance. She also goes to an evening class for German conversation. She feels that Chinnor would be improved by having a swimming pool and sports complex. It also needs a shoe shop. Chinnor also needs a by-pass because a lot of heavy traffic passes through the village on the way to the M40.The lorries make the windows rattle
